== Siolim (CT) (626690) ==

Siolim (CT) is a town in the [[BARDEZ 002]] taluka of [[NORTH GOA]] district with an area of 12.22 sq. km. and harbouring 2636 households with total population of 10936 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[PANAJI]] is at a distance of 22 km. The state headquarter [[PANAJI]] is at a distance of 22 km. Male population is 5241 and female population is 5695. Scheduled Caste population is 92 and Scheduled Tribes population is 25. Census Location Code of the town is 626690<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class IV (population_total 10,000 to 19,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is BELGAUM at a distance of 183 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is PUNE at a distance of 457 km. Railway station is at TIVIM at a distance of 15 km.

== Sanitation and Drinking Water ==  
The town has open and closed drainage system.
Water is supplied from a service reservoir. The town gets it water as tap water from a treated source. The capacity of the water supply system is 800 kilo-litres.

The nearest fire fighting service is at MAPUSA (10 km) .
